tasks.label: deploy neurosift (old - to github pages)
tasks.command: nx build neurosift && npx gh-pages -d dist/apps/neurosift --repo https://github.com/flatironinstitute/neurosift --branch gh-pages --no-history

tasks.label: deploy neurosift
tasks.command: nx build neurosift && cp apps/neurosift/devel/vercel_files/vercel.json dist/apps/neurosift/ && cp -r apps/neurosift/devel/vercel_files/.vercel dist/apps/neurosift/ && vercel --prod dist/apps/neurosift
